step_feedback.feedback: Good job on the first step! You performed the shoulder blade squeeze and circular motion well. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
In step 2, focus on smoother, more controlled circular motions.  Try to maintain a consistent rhythm and avoid jerky movements.
Step 3 shows some inconsistency.  Concentrate on completing all four repetitions with the same controlled movement as described in the instructions.

exercise_summary: You did a good job attempting the shoulder rolls exercise.  Remember to focus on smooth, controlled circular motions of your shoulder blades, and breathe deeply while pulling them back.  Consistent repetition is key to improving shoulder mobility and lymphatic flow.
